name: Sprouts (Espion Games)
description:
Sprouts is a game about allowing nature to run it's course. Make sure the plants get some light and water, and things'll be just fine.

How to Play:

Left click and drag the planet to rotate it around. Use this to provide light and water to the plants, they'll appreciate it.

Scroll to zoom in and out.

Credits:

Music - Antti Luode  from Reddit

Fonts - Google Fonts (Gaegu and Gamja Flower)
